page.title: 06Work in Tiptoe.
page.content: Mr and Mrs Gulliver are a retired couple. Mrs Gulliver has lived in Tiptoe since 1938. They spend their day doing housework and gardening. They find a car essential to make shopping trips and visit friends and relatives since the bus service is poor and there is now only one shop in Tiptoe. From an employment survey of parents we discovered that only 3 parents live and work in Tiptoe. Mrs D. Gold and Mrs M. Gold both work as playgroup supervisors. The ladies work 12 hours a week and enjoy their job. They have worked there 7 years and 6 years respectively. Mrs Coleman has been working in Tiptoe school kitchen for 3 years. She enjoys her work and likes working with the other ladies.
